title: GIMP 3 Is Shipping In May 2024... HOPEFULLY
description:
I feel like I've don't this video before but once again a release date is set for GIMP 3.0.0, if I'm being honest I don't think it's going to happen but the developers do so let's believe them for new and just see what happens.
